code: import React from"react";import"./ExperienceCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExperienceCard=_ref=>{let{title,description,items,technologies}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"experience-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"description",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description.map((text,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:text},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:item},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icons",children:technologies.map((tech,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./assets/icons/".concat(tech.toLowerCase(),".svg"),alt:tech,className:"icon"},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"technologies-names",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["[",technologies.map(tech=>tech).join(", "),"]"]})})]});};export default ExperienceCard;
